Pre-Game Insights: Nepal last participated in the T20I tri-series in Canada where they won two games and lost as many from four outings.
USA had a successful outing, winning three out of their four games, beating Namibia twice and UAE once.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series will begin on October 18, Friday, and will end on Monday, October 21.
All three T20Is between Nepal and the USA will be played at the Grand Prairie Cricket Stadium in Grand Prairie, Texas, Dallas.
There will be no television telecast of the series.
Fans can catch all the action as there will be live-streaming on the Fancode app and website.
Others: Monank Patel is set to lead the USA.
The USA vs Nepal T20I Series 2024: Full Squads are listed for both teams.
